My Story

Meet Cody

Cody resides in Boulder, CO with his 3 year old husky Poppins.

After several near death surgeries and a heart attack at 29 he decided to get serious about his health.

Cody went from 278lbs to 189lbs in only 6 months.

How? Eating whole foods, saying no to industrial seed oils, consuming a recommended amount of macro and micro nutrients, and maintaining a caloric deficit the easy way.

Cody York

Simple. Fast. Easy.

Enjoy Losing
Weight

Lets discover how I can help you shed weight eating whole foods, maintaining a caloric deficit and tracking your diet.

LindyHealth Plans

Customized
weight loss plans

Lindy Health provides customized plans that work best for you. Lindy Health's subscription plans include 1:1 coaching with monthly and weekly check-ins. Your coach will hold you accountable on a daily basis. This is what makes Lindy Health unique and guarantees results.

How to start a food blog?

Weve been fortunate enough to run a food blog business for 3+ years fully employing two people. Even if self-employment isnt your dream, weve learned a lot through our journey and think we can offer some killer advice to help you along the way, too.

How to make a dynamic logo for your food blog?

Next, you need to make your site look good. Thankfully, adding a theme makes this a snap.A framework + child theme setup is ideal (for reasons of security, seo, efficiency, etc.) and how we have our site currently setup.
